name: TVTopShelfItem
desc: An item that uses an image to represent a movie, show, or other content in the top shelf.

items.name: init(identifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a top shelf item with the specified identifier.

items.name: var playAction: TVTopShelfAction?
items.desc: The action to perform when the user wants to play the current item.

items.name: var displayAction: TVTopShelfAction?
items.desc: The action to perform when the user wants to see more information for the current item.

items.name: func imageURL(for: TVTopShelfItem.ImageTraits) -> URL?
items.desc: Returns an image associated with the current item.

items.name: func setImageURL(URL?, for: TVTopShelfItem.ImageTraits)
items.desc: Associates an image with the current item.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The unique identifier for the item.

items.name: var expirationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date on which the item becomes unavailable.
